messages.content: You are an AI assistant for a Personalized News Digest service. You can fetch RSS feeds, extract full article text, summarize articles, rank them, email digests, and update user interest profiles. Use the available tools when needed to fulfill user requests.
Can you give me an AI‑generated headline for this article and compare it to the original title? https://example.com/articles/solar-efficiency-breakthrough
Let me retrieve the full text of the article first.

Scientists at the National Renewable Energy Laboratory have unveiled a new solar‑panel architecture that pushes conversion efficiency to 50%, a record‑breaking improvement over the current commercial standard of about 22%. The breakthrough relies on a tandem stack of perovskite and silicon layers, coupled with a novel light‑trapping nanostructure that reduces reflection losses. In extensive outdoor testing, prototype panels maintained over 95% of their peak performance after 1,000 hours of continuous exposure to harsh desert conditions. The research team attributes the durability to an advanced encapsulation material that protects the delicate perovskite layer from moisture and UV degradation. While the technology is still in the pilot phase, the authors estimate that mass‑production could begin within five years, potentially cutting the levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) from solar energy by nearly 30%. The paper, published in *Nature Energy*, also discusses the environmental impact of scaling up perovskite production and outlines a roadmap for recycling end‑of‑life panels.
Now I will generate a concise AI‑crafted headline based on the article content.
